attributes.action: Deport Abu Qatada (described as osama bin ladens right hand man)
attributes.additional_details:
Qatada arrived in Britain on a fake passport in 1993, since then he has cost the taxayer 1.5 million and the massive security operation to keep an eye on him after his release would cost £40 million.
Qatada is a massive security threat, The hate-filled cleric, granted asylum here in 1994, is wanted in his native Jordan on terrorism charges but is set to resume his life in London.
